text:
logistic sigmoid σ(f) = 1
1+exp(−f) ∈[0,1], which can be interpreted as the logistic sigmoid
probability of observing y = 1 of a Bernoulli random variable y ∈{0,1}.
The function σ(·) is called transfer function or activation function, and its transfer function
activation functioninverse is called the canonical link function . From this perspective, it is
canonical link
function
For ordinary linear
regression the
activation function
would simply be the
identity .
